Blog.post: i went out today...wore a skirt... i'm not used to wearing it, so it feels a bit weird...i was supposed to do the maths project with angel today, but she backed out again...the present tat we bought for sheng ming is already wrapped...i am jus scared tat he would throw it away first without even opening it...do u think tat would happen??i dunno...one more day to school reopen...i don't want it...i rather not have any holidays at all as after holidays, i would feel so scared when i return to school...how???i got so many troubles and worries to worry and trouble...so many things to do...must pack this,pack that...do this,do that...check this ,check that...why must there be long holidays???i rather not study at all,or study all the time...what do u think???well,maybe some of u don't agree with me,but i really am scared...i forgot how i am supposed to behave, and i will panic in the middle of class,and this and that....how?????how?????

Iwent shopping with my da jie n er jie today...[yixin n semantha]half way through,we met sem's two cousins, elizabeth n celest...they were so alike!!!i went over to sem's house after the shopping, n i missed baby!!!!she has grown so much!!!!at night,i tried calling angel,but until now, it is still engaed...the maths project how??anyway,i hate tat jacky!!!he kept on pestering us by smsing me n sem every second or so...

My com is fixed... the mouse is spoilt... the keyboard lookes so dumb, and it is so inconvient to use the keyboard without the mouse...we got choir today[by the way, the date of this post might be wrong...it is 24th of june,10.40],n it was so funny!!a few dumb guys thought tat there was no guys part,n followed as girls!!!hahaha!!!the trip back home was also funny!!!execept i'm sleepy...
My com is spoilt...Dunno wat to do...dun exepect any more updates...using the com at my cousin's house...yes...tat cousin....today choir was fun...exepect for sum...

I am soooo mmmaaaddddddd!!!!!tat sheng ming actually had the cheek to follow me back home!!!!! i dunno where he came from, but i saw him as i was climbing up the staris to the third storey....I AM SO0 GONNA KILLLLLLL HIM IF HE DOESN'T APOLOGISE!!!I AM MAD!!!!Today, me n jianing n peiyi went to causeway point for dunno wat...then we left pei yi, n went to the interchange,to sit 912...so guess wad?so'd u know????I guess it was exepected...i really dunno wad to do, n he follewed me sum more!!!!!one more thing,i saw qian hui there,n wad u know,she jus ignored me!!!i am so damn down n angry!!!!

Today,wan yuan and yixin came over to do the chinese project....so boring...Later, we went to over to Wan yuan's house to continue the project as my house did not have the chinese program...so bbboooooorrrrrriiiiiiiinnnnnnnggggggggggggggggg!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Judging from the title, u could probably see that i had nothing ta do today...In the morning,I woke up, and said my good mornings, than ate, then watched television...later,i wanted to call angel, but i wanted to let her rest...she looked very pale yesterday in the late afternoons...Lionel had to return the disc tat he borrowed from the cd shop, thus he came over...the rest of the day,was watching television, and more television, and more, and more, and more...

it's a saturday...i'm at Angel's house doing the maths project,at last we can get it over and done with...Today is so funny,Angel's cousin stayed over,and he is so funny!!!Eugene is so cute!!!He is so chubby!!!SO INNOCENT LOOKING!!!I LOOVVVEEEEEEE IIIITTTTT!!!!Angel says he is really wild when he gets wild...He will get scolded and all...He compares everything to mine!!!So adorabllleee!!!!Later,i am goimg to attend a wedding dinner,HEHE!!!NOT MINE,DON'T BE MISTAKEN HORRR!!!

Today,i woke up at 7.15.I went to the bus station,and sat the bus...guess wat happened next?I reached school and found no sight of the choir members who always waited at the study area for each other...I went up to the music room, and to my horror,the practise had already started!!!IT WAS SUPPOSED TO START AT 8!!!Angel was late too,no thanks to me....Sheng ming and Angel kept on bickering at each other.Surprisingly, he never said naything bout me exect that he teased both me n Angel that we were like lesbians...ARRGGGHHHH!!!!!What did u exepect?guys r guys....Later,after school,I waited for the bus,912,and ....i saw sheng ming n edwin... those two immature guys...I HATE THEM!!!Sheng ming almost followed me home today,but at the end, he chickend out!!!!HAHAHA!!!!(am i tat scarryyyy????)back at home,it was a plpeasure to be sitting on the sofa and watching television...at least i had a nice break from those horrible guys out there including Colin!!!the girls led the dance today, and it was much better...of course, us girs,are so "angelic" right??don't you agree??anyway,i learnt more, and i found out that when sheng ming forgot the dance steps and looked at me for info,i purposely danced wrongly, n he made a fool of himself....HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!

ToDaY,My CoUsInS CaMe...they were wild!!!Angel is supposed to do the project with me TODAY,but she failed to reply...times like this is when i wonder whether t can get my project done...there is only two more weeks left for the june holidays,n she has not replied yet...i wonder when i can get my things done...

Today,we had our choir practise...it was singing...lucky me... angel went in to malaysia, and did not come for practise...thus, i was a bit lonely...Yixin had mordern dance practise today, so,i met her there...Semantha also went to malaysia i think, and rachel is also going there later this holiday...i'm freaking out at the large amount of homework i have...there is this maths project we are suppose to do on chapter nine,and a chinese project,and chinese homework,english homework...

I'm tired, i can't get to sleep...tomorrow, there will be choir practise..i don't want it to be a dance one...if it is, sheng ming would probably hit me on the head...Today was boring...i did not have any visitors over, and nor did i go out...havard went out with mummy,and they came back late at night...what did i do today u ask?nothing...i had tons of homework, but i did not even lift a finger...

Today was horrible...i went down the bus n accidentally tripped..suspect i sprained my ankle...tat was in the morning...then tat afternoon ,sheng ming kicked my ankle...it hurt as jus now i hurt my ankkle,but i did not blame him cause did kicked him,but semantha made a big fuss about it,n thus,a quarrel broke out...it's better now...dunno when we can ever get along... FRUSTRATING!!!
i'm lazy to update jus recorved from fever yesterday...awt do u guys wanna know bout school?i'm really too lazy do write...
TOday was a wet day........raining all day long...i was also splashed water by both sheng ming n shi quan...it seems tat me n sheng ming hav become worst enemies....it is going to be a long year...
